definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: A slender, elongated, threadlike object or structure.
sentences.chinese: 纤维一种细长的线状物体或组织。

sentences.english: A fissure is a linear cleft through the epidermis, or into the dermis.
sentences.chinese: 裂隙是穿过表皮或深达真皮的线状损害。

sentences.english: Results The pial microarteries contracted in line during initial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 结果脑缺血初期，细动脉呈线状收缩。

sentences.english: Active faults and lineaments , and recent volcanic activity were re-examined.
sentences.chinese: 对活断层，线状区和近代火山活动都重新作了研究。

sentences.english: A new electron microscopic technique for detecting rod or thread-shaped plant viruses has been developed by means of pre-coat grids with nonspecific polystyrene emulsion.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种检测线状或棒状植物病毒的新的电镜技术。

sentences.english: After enzyme unhairing, the basement membrane was not be observed.
sentences.chinese: 酶脱毛终了，已经观察不到基膜的线状结构存在。

sentences.english: At 700C, ZnO nanostructures with tetrapod-like and wire-like morphologies were synthesized using thermal evaporation method.
sentences.chinese: 利用热蒸发方法制得四角状和线状氧化锌纳米结构。

sentences.english: About 75% of them have full body striation.
sentences.chinese: 大约75%他们有充分的身体线状。

sentences.english: The discrete point cloud data sampling from the striation figure is common.
sentences.chinese: 采样于线状图形的离散点云数据也是常见的。

sentences.english: The intensity of the turquoise striation is also reduced.
sentences.chinese: 也减少绿松石线状的强度。

sentences.english: Filiform Lie algebras are a class of special nilpotent Lie algebras.
sentences.chinese: 线状李代数是一类重要的幂零李代数。
